archimate:DataObject.name: SecurityVulnerabilityCategoryAssignment
archimate:DataObject.documentation: It is the instance of a particular SecurityVulnerability that has been classified into one of the three categories (software flaw; software feature misuse; or software configuration issue). Notes: For example (hypothetically); Internet Explorer could have a bug that is categorized as a software flaw. There can be vulnerabilities that have one or more of the three category types associated with it. In this case; the vulnerability would be scored for all three types.
